original_text: I have made the earth, and created man upon it: I, even my hands, have stretched out the heavens, and all their host have I commanded.
korean_text: 내가 땅을 만들고 그 위에 사람을 창조하였으며 내가 내 손으로 하늘을 펴고 하늘의 모든 군대에게 명령하였노라

sentences.original_text: I, even my hands, have stretched out the heavens
sentences.korean_translation: 내 곧 나의 손이 하늘을 폈으며

sentences.original_text: and all their host have I commanded
